title: Excelente textura
body: Textura buena, se absorbe lento y deja la piel suave y brillante

title: Great product
body: Loooove this, from the first moment I put it on my skin was hydrated and plump. It also gives you a lovely glass skin look. It goes on easily and isnâ€™t to heavy and the scent is pleasant will definitely purchase again.

title: â€œSkin Feels Hydrated, Plump & Healthyâ€
body: â€œIâ€™ve been using the Medicube PDRN Serum for a few weeks and I can really see a difference in my skin. It feels more hydrated, plump, and smooth, with a healthy glow. The texture is lightweight and absorbs quickly without any stickiness. A great serum for daily skincare!â€
